channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats plan a new investment in winning rural voters, who've fled the party
item.description: Democrats are announcing a new investment to win over voters in rural areas — where the party has suffered deep losses in recent elections — by leanin...

item.title: 5 things to know about the new obesity pills that are on the way
item.description: Instead of struggling with weekly injections, patients may soon be able to swallow a daily pill to lose weight. Both the makers of Wegovy and Mounjaro...

item.title: A tradition for turkeys: Another presidential pardon
item.description: What is a presidential turkey pardon – and why is it happening again?

item.title: U.S. plans to cut ties with Boy Scouts. And, Comey and James' criminal cases dismissed
item.description: Documents show the U.S. Military plans to cut support to the Boy Scouts. And, a judge dismissed the indictments against former FBI Director James Come...

item.title: 8 economic insights we're grateful for
item.description: For this Thanksgiving, Planet Money and The Indicator staffers offer economic insights they're grateful for.

item.title: World awaits Russian response as U.S. official says Ukraine agrees to peace proposal
item.description: Ukraine has agreed to a peace proposal brokered by the Trump administration, according to a U.S. official, but Russia has yet to respond. CBS News for...

item.title: Popemobile becomes a mobile health clinic for Gaza children
item.description: The vehicle had transported the late Pope Francis on a visit to Bethlehem in 2014.

item.title: Thai woman's cremation stopped as knocking on coffin heard, temple staff say
item.description: The general manager of a Buddhist temple was startled to see her "opening her eyes" as the coffin opened, AP news agency says.

item.title: Nollywood actor Odira Nwobu dies in South Africa aged 43
item.description: News of his death has shocked many at home in Nigeria, prompting an outpouring of grief.

item.title: Dog a "CPR Hero" for helping save owner's life during cardiac arrest
item.description: A couple say Polly the golden retriever was so "in tune" with her owner, she helped save his life when his heart stopped in the middle of the night.

item.title: Amanda Shires says heartbreak-fueled album "allowed me closure"
item.description: Amanda Shires' latest album, "Nobody's Girl," captures the end of her decade-long marriage to Jason Isbell. She spoke to "CBS Mornings" about her new ...

item.title: Catholic bishop hits out at Nigeria's failure to rescue abducted schoolchildren
item.description: The police deny little is being done to find the 250 pupils and accuses the school of not co-operating.

item.title: 5 people dead in crash on Highway 83, 2 injured
item.description: A total of five people were killed in a car crash on Highway 83 in Douglas County. Three of those people were children.

item.title: Same-sex marriage must be respected throughout EU, top court tells Poland
item.description: The ruling covers the case of a Polish couple who married in Berlin but Polish authorities refused to recognise their marriage.

item.title: Trump proposal to exclude nursing as a professional degree sparks outcry
item.description: Nursing advocates say a proposed rule could worsen a shortage of professionals in the field and lead to worse health outcomes.

item.title: Wisconsin woman in 2014 Slender Man stabbing is found a day after walking away from group home
Pentagon says it’s investigating Sen. Mark Kelly over video urging troops to defy ‘illegal orders’
Thousands of arrests by Trump’s crime-fighting task force in Memphis strain crowded jail and courts
item.description: A task force ordered by President Donald Trump to combat crime in Memphis, Tennessee, has made thousands of arrests.
